name: Superfood Overnight Prebiotic Cream
about: What it is:A prebiotic overnight sleeping cream that replenishes skin so it looks silky soft, radiant, and moisturized upon waking..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness, Redness, and Uneven Texture.Formulation:Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:- Camu Camu: Rich in vitamin C, which revives skin for a healthy glow..What Else You Need to Know:Drench dull-looking skin in a cocoon of hydration with this balancing prebiotic gel-cream that works overnight for your dreamiest skin ever. The indulgent formula is infused with skin-smoothing camu camu and cocoa butter for a radiant and refreshed complexion upon waking..Clinical Results:In an independent user trial, results based on 59 people over 4 weeks:
ingredients: -Camu Camu: Rich in vitamin C, which revives skin for a healthy glow. .-Cocoa Butter: Rich in fatty acids, which provides skin with essential moisture. .-Banana Flower Extract: Rich source of antioxidants, which protects the skin from free radicals...Aqua/Water/Eau, PEG-8, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Sodium Polyacrylate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Hydroxyacetophenone, Phenoxyethanol, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Fragrance (Parfum), Carbomer, Disodium EDTA, Alpha-Glucan Oligosaccharide, Bentonite, Chondrus Crispus (Carrageenan) Extract, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Limonene, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Propanediol, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Linalool, Benzyl Alcohol, Citronellol, Lithothamnion Calcareum Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Extract, Litsea Cubeba Fruit Oil, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil, Musa Sapientum (Banana) Flower Extract, Citral, Myrciaria Dubia Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, Dehydroacetic Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-At night, use directly after cleansing or as the final step in your ritual. .-Massage a pearl-size amount onto face, neck, and d√©colletage in upward strokes...Recycling Instructions:.-Rinse out any remaining product..-Recycle jar, inner lid, and outer packaging according to local recycling guidelines.

reviews.review_text: Indulging in the Elemis Midnight Facial Nourishing Sleeping Cream has become an essential ritual in my nightly skincare routine. After cleansing and toning, I gently massage a pea-sized amount of the luxurious cream onto my face and neck, allowing it to cocoon my skin in a veil of nourishing hydration. The experience of using this cream is truly decadent. Its rich texture glides effortlessly onto the skin, leaving it feeling instantly hydrated and pampered. The subtle scent is reminiscent of a botanical garden, adding a touch of relaxation to my bedtime routine. In the short term, I noticed immediate results as my skin appeared more radiant and refreshed upon waking. The cream effectively minimizes the visible signs of fatigue, leaving my complexion looking revitalized and dewy. Over time, the long-term benefits of using this cream became apparent. My skin feels noticeably softer and smoother. Additionally, the prebiotic properties help to improve the overall appearance of my skin tone, giving me a healthy and luminous glow. In summary, the Elemis Midnight Facial Nourishing Sleeping Cream is a must-have for anyone seeking to replenish dry, thirsty skin with glow-giving moisture. Its indulgent texture and revitalizing formula make it the perfect addition to any nighttime skincare routine, delivering both immediate and long-term results for a radiant complexion.

I was really surprised by how much I loved this. I own the Elemis cleansing balm and love that but have never tried other products from their line.   The consistency is silky (medium thickness). It absorbs super easily and applies nicely on a serum. What I like is this does not sit on top of your skin. For example, I am not a fan of the drunk elephant polypeptide cream because it just sits on your skin. This actually absorbs!!  I have used this product for two weeks. I am about to turn 26 with oily to dry skin. Aka my t zone gets breakouts but other areas are dry. I use tretinoin about twice a week in conjunction with exfoliants (microexfoliant, and paula‚Äôs choice). I do find that my skin barrier is not always happy. When I used this I was absolutely stunned my how my skin loved it. I truly felt and saw I woke up with my skin looking hydrated.   I will say that this product is GREAT for hydration. Especially after a day where you exfoliated. Whether this is good for signs of aging, I‚Äôm not sure. The ingredients in this product point more to hydration then combating fine lines (aka you want to use more peptides or skinceuticals has a phenomenal cream).   I truly loved this.   The one con is this is fragranced. So if you have sensitive skin this might not work for you and might cause a flare. That did not happen to me after exfoliating but it has happened with other fragranced products in the past. The scent itself is not overbearing and I enjoyed it.
